duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, overseeing the execution of the food program.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruiting, interviewing, and hiring staff, and delegating and following up on tasks.
Provide regular and predictable onsite attendance, and perform shift supervisions and assume Store Manager responsibilities when needed.
Ensuring all shift sales are completed in accordance with company policies and keeping accurate cash, sales, and inventory control records.
Assist in maintaining a safe environment for employees and customers, and implementing non-discriminatory related management skills while hiring, training, and mentoring employees.
Prepares or assists in the preparation of sales, product, and operating reports as directed by the Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
